Articles.Content: Music is always a huge part of the feel of space in both movies and games. Maybe not upon initial release, but how cool would it be if KSP2 had its own original soundtrack and not just the same royalty free tracks? an orchestrated recretion of the KSP main theme, along with several other awesome tracks for building craft, launching, orbit, landing, reentry, etc.?
Not a bad idea, but I'd have to hear it before purchasing it. If the soundtrack doesn't catch my attention, or annoys me while playing, I won't buy it.
a real game studio is making this so they will likely include a real composed soundtrack

I can't  say it would really bother me either way.

Yes I would prefer a more varied soundtrack, and original would be most welcome, but it wouldn't affect whether I buy it, or how much I enjoy playing enough to be an issue.
